sentence.Network_en: Many aspiring young artists are advised to learn by copying the masters.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多胸怀抱负的年轻画家被建议通过临摹大师的作品来学习绘画。

sentence.Network_en: Aspiring musicians need hours of practice every day.
sentence.Network_cn: 想当音乐家就要每天练许多小时。

sentence.Network_en: It's a kind way of telling aspiring novelists, "Don't give up the day job".
sentence.Network_cn: 这是劝诫立志成为小说家者“不要丢了正业”的一种温和方式。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 请教“有抱负的”的英语翻译、例句。英文菜鸟一级涉世未深1942天前最佳回答:  We want aspiring (有抱负的) students who are truly interested and will.
apprehensive 有理解力的aspiring 有志气的，有抱负的audacious 大胆的，有冒险精神的
aspirin 阿斯匹林aspiring 热心的aspish 似毒蛇的
asphalt n．沥青aspiring adj．热心的，积极的，有抱负的assassinate vt．暗杀，行刺

entry.def: If you use aspiring to describe someone who is starting a particular career, you mean that they are trying to become successful in it.

example.ex: Many aspiring young artists are advised to learn by copying the masters.
example.tran: 许多胸怀抱负的年轻画家被建议通过临摹大师的作品来学习绘画。

means.word_mean: 2. desiring or striving for recognition or advancement

auth_sentence.content: Nasty was Nastassja Kinski, an aspiring German actress.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nasty was Nastassja Kinski, an aspiring German actress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nasty was Nastassja Kinski, an aspiring German actress.

auth_sentence.content: There are very few better publications for young aspiring scientists.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are very few better publications for young aspiring scientists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are very few better publications for young aspiring scientists.

auth_sentence.content: Huaxi holds special status in a nation aspiring to wealth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Huaxi holds special status in a nation aspiring to wealth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Huaxi holds special status in a nation aspiring to wealth.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏
